pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gossip is a Gnome integrated and HIG compliant jabber messaging client.

use.flag: Enable debug path in gossip. net-libs/loudmouth needs to be compiled with USE="debug" to allow Gossip to actually build the debug code path.
Allows Gossip to use gnome-keyring to store passwords.
Allows Gossip to show visual notifications concerning various activities via libnotify.
